thread.title: KM-Draughn football re-set for Monday; Other schedule changes may arise
thread.title_full: KM-Draughn football re-set for Monday; Other schedule changes may arise

author: Alan Ford
title: KM-Draughn football re-set for Monday; Other schedule changes may arise
text: Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 11:29 AM Updated at 11:34 AM The weather continues to throw a wrinkle into the Friday night nights in the Cleveland County area. Kings Mountain’s scheduled South Mountain Athletic Conference at Draughn has been postponed until Monday. The contest will kick off at 7 p.m. Crest and Chase have already moved up the scheduled kickoff time of Friday’s homecoming contest at Sid Bryson Stadium. The SMAC match up will begin at 6:30 p.m. Stay tuned to www.shelbystar.com or ‘Like’ The Shelby Star on Facebook for updates.
